modName: TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - CBBE
summary: TERA Armors Collection finally (some of it) converted to CBBE :D
descriptionHtml:
[heading][b][center]NOTE:[/center][/b][/heading]

This is [color=red]NOT[/color] at all a [color=red]"LORE-FRIENDLY" [/color] mod, it has skimpy female armors (surprised?)and also "Bonus" contains MALE ARMORS too, (thats new). If you have unique problem please PM me. I will reply faster than leaving a comment in the "Posts" But before you PM check comments, good people already have answer and will answer again
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[heading][b][center]******************History, it starts somewhere right?******************[/center][/b][/heading]

[color=ORANGE] This is my Very first upload Ever. Me and perhaps other people have been waiting for some CBBE conversion of that magnificent mod by Asianboy345 ( TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - UNP), But conversion never came.

This started as a personal conversion of some armors for my own use, then i thought why not jus convert them all and upload it? Well here it is, This is my first try so please be Lenient[/color]
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[heading][b][center]IMPORTANT STUFF[/center][/b][/heading]

[b]Requirements:[/b]

Skyrim version Updated Till 1.8( for future above too)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Caliente's Body:[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846] TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim(any version till 1.7) - UNP:[/url]

[b]Installation notes:[color=red]NMM[/color][/b]
Step 1:Install Caliente's CBBE body (already installed? move next step)
Step 2:Install TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - UNP (link provided above) male armor and textures are from there.
Step 3: Now Finally install this "CONVERSION" mod, and when prompted to overrite press "yes to mod". And you are done.

[b]Where can you find them?[/b]
Well Duh!. They are in the forges, all forges any forges!

[b] Specific Mod notes: Summary [/b]

1.[color=Yellow] Never DROP any ARMOR PIECE in the "SKYRIM WORLD", INDOOR OR OUTDOOR IN-SKY, UNDERGROUND or OBLIVION PLANES [/color] it can screw up game.
2.Helmets and hoodies are invisible, they auto-equip for perk bonuses.
3.Currently perks are not required for forging,but will be required from version 1.8 onward.
4.All Mage Robes have armor as well but game think them as cloth (fool).
5.For more details please go to: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846] TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim[/url] and scroll down to : WHAT THIS MOD CONTAINS

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[heading][b][center]Misc Stuff[/center][/b][/heading]

[b]Bugs:[/b]
Clippings issue here and there.
There is bound to be Clipping issues some where, as I am a Human being and the CBBE body is bigger than UNP.
Some armors work only on weight 0 or 100 else they blow up..
Found a bug? Good! comment on the sticky "relevant version" post.

Conversion Status:
47 of the armors have been converted put of the 47 (v1.75).

[center][b]List of Armors[/b]

Castanic hunter
Silver spellsword
Rubicite Armor

arcadia

New armors in 1.7
Deathskin
Brigandine
Ascendant
Sakhanda [/center]

New armors in 1.80
Gracshed
Elleon
Necrosin
Ebon Shroud
Chaos Bloodplate
*cant remember rest of the two names* :P
[b] Changelog:[/b]

Version 1.80
7 new armors added after a loong time

Version 1.75
Fixed Folder structure scew up.

Version 1.70
Fixed Voidmeld boots.
Fixed Sentencia clipping through the legs.
Fixed "tail" of white mage robe.
Fixed Arcadia Boots clip into the legs.
Fixed Jalmarak boots.

Version 1.60 Update
Fixed the Long time mesh explosion of berserker Armor... (this set made me go berserk)
Fixed karassia mesh explosion.
Fixed White mage mesh explosion.
Fixed Deathshell mesh explosion.
Fixed Skyoar mesh explosion.

Version 1.40 Update
Fixed Texture issue of Silver Spellsword.
Fixed Texture issue on Voildmeld body
Minor fixing here and there.

Version 1.35 Update
The rest of the 4 armors have been done.

Version 1.30
Changes to previous existing armors covered.
Skysoar Armor Redone. (works at weight 0 and 100)
Jalmarak Armor Redone.
Viator Armor Redone.

Version 1.20
All 36 armors have been uploaded now.

Version 1.15B
Fixed clipping Issue with castanic hunter boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with White Mage Armor boots.
Fixed missing textures for some people on Jalmarak armor.
Fixed clipping Issue with White SkySoar Armor boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with High Elf Paladin boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with Elven Inquisitor boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with Berserker Metal boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with StormCloak Operatives boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with Elven Scaled boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with Viator Armor boots.
Fixed Vertex Weight issue with Atroscine Armor.
Fixed clipping Issue with Clarion Robe boots.
Fixed clipping Issue with Sententia Armor boots.

Version 1.10B
Eight armors converted to CBBE

Version 1.05B
Based on Asianboy's advice, converted armors look more detailed dark ,see pictures.
No new armor conversion added.

Version 1.0
First release 22 Armors converted to CBBE

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[heading][b][center]Legal Stuff(ooooo)[/center][/b][/heading]

[b]Permissions:[/b]
Permission Taken from En Masse Entertainment, the conversation has been submitted to the moderators.
Permission Taken from Asianboy345.

[b]Credits:[/b]
Bethesda Softworks-- For creating and allowing us to mod this Fantastic Game.
En Masse Entertainment-- For granting me permission.
Nightasy-- Without his tutorials i wouldnt be uploading this.
Frigus-- For providing his 6 converted armors as i am getting lazy with this... :P
Caliente-- Who gave us the Best Body on the nexus.
Asianboy345-- Who allowed to modify his work, and also provided me guidance.
